vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
βολίζω,
(βολίς) heave the lead, take soundings, [NT]:—passive, sink in water, [Refs]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to take a sounding (a nautical technical term) sound
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to take a sounding (a nautical technical term) sound
to take soundings, sound, Acts 27:28*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 拋出測深錘, 探測水深 (徒 27:28)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 抛出测深锤, 探测水深 (徒 27:28)
